name: ROBLOX Style (Work in progress...) ( UPDATE 1 )
description:
Hello everyone, It's me MartinKaede from Youtube.

Here is one nice style to optimize your ROBLOX lobby.
Take note to subscribe to my channel on Youtube for more of these. 

It works for any computers.


WARNING: DON'T SEND ME ANY HATE IF YOU THINK IT DOESN'T WORK!

If you have any problems with it, change to DARK theme in Roblox.

That should fix it.
additional_info:
- I fixed the reload time for Roblox Home.

- Games tab now works good.

- Catalog now is working too.

- Working on Develop and Create and Catalog items.
***** 

Not too much going on for the first update. Hopefully i finish it next week.
